blacksmith.title: Blacksmith
dialogue_hooks: Need something repaired?
Finest weapons in all the realm!
I can make you something special... for the right price.
My forge has been burning for three generations.
description_templates: A {trait} {title} with soot-covered hands and a {tactile_adjective} demeanor.
This {trait} craftsperson works at a {visual_adjective} forge.

guard.title: Guard
dialogue_hooks: Move along, citizen.
Any trouble and you'll answer to me.
The city is safe while we're on watch.
Halt! State your business.
description_templates: A {trait} {title} in {visual_adjective} armor, standing at attention.
This {trait} sentinel maintains a {tactile_adjective} watch over the area.
A {trait} {title} with a {visual_adjective} weapon at their side.

merchant.title: Wandering Merchant
dialogue_hooks: Step right up! Best prices in the land!
I have rare goods from distant shores.
Perhaps we can make a deal?
Everything must go! Well, almost everything.
description_templates: A {trait} {title} with a {visual_adjective} cart full of wares.
This {trait} trader has a {tactile_adjective} smile and shrewd eyes.

mage.title: Mage
dialogue_hooks: The arcane flows strongly here.
Magic is both art and science.
I sense great potential in you.
The weave of reality is delicate indeed.
description_templates: A {trait} {title} wearing {visual_adjective} robes that shimmer with power.
This {trait} spellcaster has a {tactile_adjective} presence about them.

innkeeper.title: Innkeeper
dialogue_hooks: Welcome! Come in, come in!
Best ale this side of the mountains.
I hear all sorts of rumors in this tavern.
Room and board? We have plenty!
description_templates: A {trait} {title} with a {tactile_adjective} laugh and warm smile.
A {trait} {title} who greets everyone with {tactile_adjective} hospitality.

hermit.title: Hermit
dialogue_hooks: Few venture this far from civilization.
The old ways are not forgotten by all.
Silence speaks louder than words.
You seek something... I can tell.
description_templates: A {trait} {title} living in isolation, with a {tactile_adjective} presence.
This {trait} recluse has {visual_adjective} features weathered by solitude.
